alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 2:55AM PST until January 18 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected, with pockets of freezing rain possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 8 inches, heaviest above 3500 feet. Localized ice accumulation of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels around 3000 feet today will lower to 1500 to 2000 feet this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
